item.title: Designing a model with dynamic properties
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we started working on this project aimed at the creative community, we faced an interesting challenge. We needed to build a model that was similar to a task but with a key difference: it had to support custom, dynamic, and extensible properties.
